title: Religious - Beautiful surroundings!!
review: Neem karoli Baba or popularly known as Kainchi Dham is situated on the banks of river is approx 9 KM from Bhimtal. Temple is very famous among locals and tourists. It is kept clean and maintained NO photography allowed inside. In case you are travelling to Ranikhet it comes on the way. You may take stop to enjoy some fresh lime or can eat some snacks. Lots of shops available outside the temple. Take blessings of Baba and  feel blessed. They have some rooms for stay also. View of lush green surroundings are awesome and perfect for photography lovers. Good halt in case travelling from Kathgodam to Ranikhet.

title: beautifully palce religious place
review: karari maharaj is local religios saint worshipped by locals.the temple and ashram is beautifully built and maintained.it is located between two huge mountains hence called kainchi dham.veri quiet place for meditation

title: Jai Baba Neem Karoli
review: Kainchi Dham is a Temple and Ashram founded by famous Maharaj Neem Karoli Baba. Temple is small but it is very neat, clean and beautiful.

title: A small neat temple
review: The temple complex is very neatly maintained. However, there was neither a priest, staff member nor any board or literature telling about the place.

title: Wonderful and peaceful surroundings
review: A real beautiful and breathtaking place on the banks of river. The view is lush green and superb. Temple is a small one but kept very neat and clean. If you are around Nainital, you must visit this attraction to experience something which is wonderful.

title: Most awesome Hanuman Temple. Ultimate cleaneness
review: It is an experience visiting this temple. No prased can be takne inside or flowers. Spick and Span at all times of the year. Amaziiing vibes

title: Must visit ashram - serene and tranquil
review: Nestles in the lap of the mountains , next to a rivulet. its so serene and tranquil that one will certainly fall in love with this Ashram. This is the place where Baba Neem Karauli used to live and meditate.

title: Serene and beautiful place
review: We went it while going from Nainital to Kaushan. It's on the road and easily accessible. A small jhora beside it has enhanced the beauty.

title: Sacred place at a very high altitude | Worth a visit
review: Kainchi is a term used for two sharp hairpin bends of the motor road in local dialect hence the name.

title: Pakoras
review: We stopped here on our way to Ranikhet. Pakoras and lime soda available. lot of monkeys around the place.

title: spiritual
review: dedicated to karari maharaj, the local saint of the region, this absolutely neat and clean temple complex is on the way to kausani. situated on the banks of the stream, there is a lot of peace and serenity inside the temple.

title: Peaceful place and serene atmosphere
review: We visited this place while going to jageshwar dham from Kathgodam. The dham is just beside a river and the atmosphere is very peaceful.

title: Bit far from Nainital.
review: Good place but have to travel a bit far nice place to visit with family can have some good peaceful time here.

title: Calm place
review: Nice place. the resting place for Baba Nemmb Karori who has built quite a few temples in this district. Calm and quiet place in a serene location on banks of a stream .

title: A beautiful Ashram
review: We stopped here because our driver recommended and i am glad we did. The place has a very calming influence. It was a good stop. The refreshments available just outside the ashram are good. The lime soda is a must try there.

title: Nice Quiet Place
review: This is a temple of Baba Nemmb Karori. The place is situated a little far from Nainital City. The scenic beauty is really good as it's surrounded by hills and a stream passing by the temple. We visited this place on our journey towards Ranikhet from Nainital.

title: Very quiet place with an aura about it
review: The place is well known for its religious value. I like this place more due to its location and also to some extent an aura of serenity surrounding it.

title: Nice place for a visit
review: This is located in the outskirts bhowali range and is a temple cum ashram... The place has a great view of the mountains and it is very peaceful and gives a glimpse of the divine natural surroundings...

title: Best Experience Ever
review: We visited the Neeb Karori Baba's ashram at Kainchi Dham near Bhowali in Nainital district. The feeling is awesome when you go there. The place is extremely neat and clean and provides a great atmosphere for the devotees. The ashram is about 7 kms from Bhowali - one has to drive to get there. I would strongly recommend that you read about Neeb Karori baba before you go there. There are limited rooms in the ashram for devotees.

title: beautiful and serene
review: just breathless, small temple by the river stream. Serene....

title: Very scenic place
review: Kainchi dhaam is gaining its name and fame through social media. No doubt it is a very attractive place for any tour lover who dips his own quest for natures beauty and scenic flora and fauna. Above all the grace of Baba Neeb Karori you can also bound to get provided you keep eternal faith on him.

title: Not much to see
review: Some temples are built together in this place and bhajans are going around. Mostly people stop and visit this place on the way to Ranikhet

title: Spiritual journey
review: This is the place to visit for the spirituality and rejoicing your soul. This is a place to know your inner self.

title: Very peaceful
review: One of the most peaceful temples I have been to. Really nice to sit there and listen to Hare Rama Hare Krishna chants going on in the temple. Very very peaceful.

title: Baba Neem Karoli Ashram
review: A very interesting place to visit the place where Neem Karoli Baba lived it's still having a beautiful sculpture of him.The place is quite calm.

title: So so
review: Not so must visit location.

title: Kainchi Dhaam Temple
review: This ashram is of Baba Neem Karoli. The entire temple is well maintained and very clean.  Do pay your homage while here.

title: Serene atmosphere and beautiful surroundings
review: For anyone with even a slightly religious bend of mind, this place should be on the visit list. The place is situated next to the road and can easily be reached. The atmosphere is very serene and calms the soul.

title: For Peace seekers
review: Situated on road under a beautiful Hill, Kainchi Dham is for Peace Seekers. Come here to sit at least for half an hour and absorb the spiritual peaceful vives sitting your eyes closed. It on the way to Pangot-Kilbury.

title: Holy Place....
review: Good place with positive energy and good thoughts you feel relax and calm and full of spirituality....

title: Ultimate place
review: its really a wonderful beautiful holy place of baba neem karori well maintained clean and green located at beautiful place

title: Lovely - serenity calmness and divinity - all in one!
review: Take the small drive down - its worth it - and a visit to a temple during your holidays - come one - its only gonna get better!

title: Visit to Kanchidham
review: This is a holy place near Nainital appr. 17km away. Very peaceful place. Maintaining cleanliness. It is believed that once you visit, whatever your wishes, are fulfilled in future. should be visited once.

title: Energizing
review: A great place to visit and get energized. Great personalities have visited this place and is worth the effort.

title: Sacred place in the hills
review: Very big temple on the way to ranikhet near Bhowali. very sacred to the people of the region. Nice scenic beauty around.

title: Spiritual Paradise and not just a Religious place.
review: A spiritual retreat where people of all religions and faiths are welcome.

title: Nice tample
review: It's a tapmle not a tourist attraction. Very clean . Nice view. Few monkies. Very far from Nainital . Don't go specially . You can cover this spot while going towards ranikhet

title: Nice Place
review: Nice Place. Nothing much to see. Only you can take photos since its opposite to lake. So you can get good pictures

title: Temple by Maharaj Karoli ji
review: This temple is made by Maharaj karoli He served the needy in all surroundings of this place,Maharaj ji has met Shri Hanuman ji personally many times and got his ashirwad,it is believed  that still he is thier after his death,on 15 june there is a big gathering at this temple.

title: Soul seeking place
review: Kainchi Dham is a Hindu Temple situated in the hill zone of uttrakhand zone. Beautiful Temple with the living place (cottage) of guru ji.Big celebrities including Larry Page, Mark Zukherberg and Steve Jobs have visited this place.It's a place who wants to experience silence (deep meditative awareness) and enjoy the running water of river .Overall scenic view of beautiful river and mountains covered with clouds and peaceful atmosphere.

title: Kaichi dham
review: I had my own reasons to visit

title: beautiful temple
review: The gods and goddesses are very well dressed in this temple.bajrangbali ji ,Durga deviji,and all other devtas .It is just 25 km from Nainital .one must surely visit it and the fruits you get on the way are just awesome

title: At peace
review: The peace that you find at this place is like none other. Not an ardent fan of idol workship went to this place for the hype but came back with a belief that certain places have that aura that leave you short of your words.

title: Nice temple on Nainital-Almora road
review: Kainchi dham is a prominent pilgrimage site in India located on the Nainital-Almora Road. Winters are considered one of the best seasons to explore the surreal beauty of Kainchi dham where one can just relax and escape the city blues. This place is covered as a sight seeing destination when you travel from Nainital to Almora or Ranikhet.

title: Kaichi Sham....Neem Karoli Baba, Samadhi Temple
review: There is a real life kind of statue/idol with several other small temples, a great place of reverence and worship in the vicinity of Bhowali, Nainital, Bhimtal, about 7 kms from Bhowali Chowk  on the Bhowali Almora road, one should try moong ka pakora in the restaurants  near the temple, a must visit for religious and spiritual

title: Awsome place with serenity
review: We visited kainchi dham recently..it was a very calm and serene place.temple was very well maintained.....we came to know the history of the temple...A very famous and must go place when u visit Nainital...

title: Peaceful and natural beauty
review: A place different from Nainital crowd and just few minutes away from city centre.

title: Serene atmosphere.
review: Its a famous temple having deities of many gods along with the statue of Neem Karori Baba. It is visited by many people however, the number of tourists visiting is not overwhelming.

title: Spiritual place
review: On the way from Nainital to Ranikhet, we visited this temple. Nice place to take a break on a long road trip. The temple is well maintained with a small garden with flowers blossoming in it. Photography is prohibited inside the temple. a small riverine flows just beside the temple with fishes in it. Also you can spot a bunch of monkeys here. Overall a nice refreshing and peaceful place.

title: Good place to visit
review: There ain't much crowd, so you can easily walk in. There ain't any photography allowed though. Nor using your mobile phones. There are around 5-6 idols. There is the place where Neeb Karori baba used to sit, worship and sleep. The place is really clean.

title: Haven't seen cleaner temple than Kainchi Dham
review: After visit to this temple, I found it to be very calm and clean so offering prayer is very relaxing.

title: Peace and love🤗
review: I really like holly kainchi dham  I feel very positive energy peacefully environment.  I believe in spirituality. I followed neem kroli baba ji .i really love this place

title: Serene and beautiful place
review: I always wanted to pay my respect to Baba Neem karori Maharaj ji. When I reached his Ashram known as Kanchidham on 9th June 2018 it was raining but the place was full of devotees of Maharaj ji. It has a statue of Maharaj ji and the place and his Aasan where he used to sit and deliver his sermons. The place has a feeling of peace and tranquillity despite presence of a large number of devotees.

title: Divine, Serene & Spiritual Place
review: Kainchi Dham built by Baba Neeb Karoli, it is around 19 kms from Naini Tal on the Bhowali - Almora Highway situated on the banks of the Kosi. 15 June is the foundation day of this dham and it is said over a lakh devotees from far and wide visit the place and accept prasad.

title: Stop over place on the way to Kausani Vie Ranikhet
review: Nice temple on river and this place is must stop over if you are going to Kausani via Ranikhet. Lot of Monkey so try to avoid carry of eating food around bridge.

title: Such a divine and peaceful place
review: We had heard a lot about this temple in kanchidham and yes we really like the whole ambience, it was so ca and peaceful place! Liked it!

title: Religious place
review: On the way to Ranikhet from Nainital, it placed between mountains on coast of local shipra river. Religious place gives peace.

title: Very nice place
review: Very nice place en route from Nainital to Ranikhet. Very peaceful with temples. We enjoyed watching monkeys diving, swimming and bathing in the river. Must visit.

title: Go for the calming effect !!
review: Enroute from Nainital to Almora , this religious centre is good for taking a break and paying your respects to the Hindu Gods at the various temples located here started by a Guru !! Located on the banks of river Kosi, the ashram has a huge following and during the month of June every year an annual fair is held here. Go for the calming effect on your senses.

title: A Holy Place To Visit
review: One can feel sacred and Holy while visiting Kainchi Dham. This is one of the place where Neeb Karori Baba meditate. So peaceful and spiritual.

title: beautiful temple
review: Close to bhowali, a calm and serene place en route to almora/ranikhet. Iconic orange coloured temple gives you peace to relax for some time. A religious place and easy to visit en route.

title: A Clean, Calm & Serene place-suitable for believers.
review: Reached early in the morning. Had brushing & bathing at a Paid Bath/toilet facility. Hot and tasty breakfast available at Maruti restaurant nearby. Reasonable cost. People are generally helpful. Mountainous area. Generally a cold place. Even in the day time, require 2 sweaters. Nainital is nearby within 1 hour. Travel by bus or share vans/cars, etc. There are many places of religious importance to visit in this area. No proper stay arrangement available in Kanchi Dham. Stay at Almora or Nainatal. Trip was pleasant.

title: Holy Place of Neem Karoli Baba Ji Maharaj
review: Dham i.e. Temple is now very much popular due to Steve Jobs & Mark Zuckerberg but actually it’s the place where Baba Ji stayed for a long time during his life time.

title: Spiritual Visit
review: A Family visit to Kainchi Dham. A very peaceful place. Find solace in the location. Well kept & maintained by staff. Excellent Shikwanji just at the entry of temple.

title: Cleanliest Religious Place
review: The temple is very clean and well maintained. The God murtis are pleasant. It is the place blessed by Nim Karoni Baba

title: Cleanest temple so far
review: This temple is 7km from bhawali or around 20 km from nainital. Famous among locals as the neem karori temple/kainchi dham is the cleanest temple i have visited in India so far from inside. Its a small temple but very popular among locals. Must visit

title: Spritual visit
review: The temple is located on river side, in a beautiful valley. Blessed by Neem Karoli Babaji Maharaj, a devotee of Lord Hanuman.

title: Eternal Piece
review: The place has a powerful positive energy. We could not find any overnight stay options nearby. The Ashram allows only the members to stay.

title: over rated
review: Over rated. The temple is nice and serene, but food places very average. All cab guys will ask you to eat there, don't know why.

title: Just Wonderful - Jai Baba Hanuman
review: It was very peaceful and nice temple. Kainchi is a beautiful secluded mountain ashram located in the Kumoan Hills in Uttarakand.The Kainchi Dham ashram where Neem karoli Baba stayed in the last decade of his life. It is must visit when you are in Nainital.

title: Famous temple enroute Nainital
review: A must stopover for us whenever we are heading beyond Nainital. The temple is famous amongst the locals and tourists alike. Set beside a river, surprisingly it is a very clean temple. The small eateries near the temple are famous for its lemon shikanji, tea and other snacks.

title: Famous because of Steve jobs
review: The Ashram is famous because of many known big names recommended this location. its an average temple ashram where for general public the access to inside ashram is restricted however people can visit the temple inside and see where the Head (baba) of the temple used to live.

title: Neem Karoli Baba Hanuman Mandir
review: I have been visiting this complex of 5 Mandirs and Samadhi Mandir of the this very well known Saint Nib Karori Baba / Neem Karoli Baba since 1970 (when He was still in His body).  Over this time the complex has grown & evolved & has become a must see for everyone going from Nanital to Almora.  Everyone in Nanital District knows of Him & he is famous worldwide through His American devotees Ram Dass & Krishna das.

title: "just another temple for me"
review: people like Steve jobs, or mark zukerberg follow the head of this temple. but i didn't connect with this religious place. There is nothing extraaaa odinery  here. just an old temple. my husband wanted to visit this once ,that was the only reason we came to nainitaal.

title: must visit due to location and cleaniness
review: this dham is en route to Ranikhet ,must visit as it is well maintained very good location near a stream, even if one is not pious must visit for it's beauty and hygiene kept in temple is must see.

title: The peak of divinity !
review: This place is an oasis for all devotees and faithfully who have great devotion for Ram and Hanuman

title: Anniversary celebration
review: It's a place who wants to experience silence (deep meditative awareness) and enjoy the running water of river . The rest of things about neem karori Baba is available on net (Wikipedia and on his website ) .

title: Peaceful Place
review: One of the best place during our travel.

title: SPIRITUAL EXPERIENCE
review: We were going to Ranikhet and stopped at this place as I had heard a lot about Neem Karoli Baba. This place was his summer residence and many international fame celebrities come here. It was early morning so we didn't have crowd and could spend some quality time here. Very peaceful and must place to visit.

title: SERENE PLACE
review: ashram is located alongside a mini water body. Environment clean and serene. Meditation in Ashram wonderful. 3/4 shops selling hot food items and local delicacies. A Nimbu shikanji wala Mr. Tiwari flattens you with his charm and manners. Enjoyable place

title: Peace and more peace!
review: Loved to be here! The whole experience of visiting Kainchi Dham in itself was a magical one. There is something in the air itself that you feel light, like free from all the worldly tensions and everything around. Your mind and soul feels at peace and super relaxed. Felt rejuvenated!

title: Must visit Kainchi Dham Bhowali, Nainital
review: I visited Kainchi Dham on 19th of July 2017. The place is most sacred and one who goes Nainital must visit this place with family. Prefer to visit early in the morning or in the evening as you can get prasad from Mandir at this time. There are no pandas or priests. You can freely visit this place.

title: Must Visit place for Spiritual People
review: 1. Very Peaceful environment

title: The famous ashram of Neeb Karori Baba
review: This Ashram is very famed place of Nib Karori Baba (Lakshman Das Ji). It is here that he did penance. Its attraction can be gauged from the fact that its visitors included Steve Jobs and Mark Zukerberg.

title: Nainital attraction good vibes
review: We visited this place enroute from Nainital to Ranikhet.

title: Peaceful
review: Didn't had an idea that had visited here some 17 years back too... Still peaceful, clean and nicely maintained... Calmness of the place soothes

title: Dham of spiritual believe
review: Must visit place for tourism, a peaceful and blessing place where any one can show his and her trust for the almighty.

title: a clean temple near the river
review: the temple is very ordinary but the baba neem karoli ji is very famous and popular among locals as well as among foreigners.

title: Very peaceful and lovable place
review: I visited here today for the second time.very peaceful and quiet and calm place.visit here at least once

title: a must visit
review: a very calm and beautiful place , we visited while returning from ranikhet to nainital , it has a positive vibes

title: serene and beautiful
review: calm and peaceful place with beautiful location.

title: Visit with Family
review: We went for siggt seeing to all the Tal so we rented an alto and a bullet from Mallital and we went to kainchi dham the trip was nice no traffic. Road were good only at 1 or 2 places we found some congestion. The temple was big and not crowded ..my parents went and come out withing 20 mins we had refreshing nimboo pani there..

title: avg place
review: average place to visit.15 km away from nainital.it will hardly take 10 min to visit this place .location is beautiful.

title: Wonderful place
review: We reached there around 12 noon and stayed there for almost 1 hour. Very nice place well maintained.

title: Jai Mata di
review: This temple is situated in the middle of kathgodam-nainital road. This temple once was home to श्री नीम करौरी बाबा who was also followed by people like Steve jobs and Mark zuckerberg. This temple was established by baba neem karori  and enshrines  the idols of vaishno devi,  kalI Mata, Lord hanuman, Lord shiva and lord radha-krishna. It is a very beautiful and serene place with a cool peaceful environment.

title: Neem Karoli Baba Ashram
review: This is the Neem Karoli Baba Ashram situated at the Bhowali Almora Road. The place is serene and calm.

title: Jai Neeb Kirori Baba
review: A beautiful temple in a calm valley of Bhi wali. Historically pious and a holy place. One must sit down for some time to recite Hanuman Chaleesa there. Beware of monkeys. Beautiful flowers. It's better to leave your phones in the car and just enjoy the divine abode. Overall a must visit place.

title: serene temple in the outskirts of nainital
review: the kainchi dham is around 20 mins from nainital.. a beautiful temple where the goddesses are dressed in gorgeous sarees.

title: Peaceful
review: If you know Steve Jobs and Mark Zuckerburg , then you must google them in relation to this place. Visited by both to recover from their difficult life, this place is for deep thinking and flushing your soul.

title: excellant place
review: beautiful place on the way to almora from bhowali. the importance and beauty of this place multiplied many times if anyone has faith and he listened about the great saint shri neem karori babaji. also this is good place to rest a while on the way to almora.

title: Infinite Joy
review: The Kainchi Dham nestled between mountains and surrounded by trees is a perfect place to stop as one drives from Naintal towards Ranikhet. The devout have various reasons for doing so but even for the non devout as they walk into the temple a sense of calmness engulfs them, soaks up the worries, anxieties and replaces it with a sense of happiness and confidence in oneself. That is the power of  kainchi Dham where the great mystic and spiritual guru, Neem Karori Baba who founded the temple and is worshipped here continues to provide solace to any and everyone who chance to enter the temple complex. Sitting in front of the great guru one is very easily able to look inwards and get answers to a lot of questions to go through life with focus on a definitive path. Everyone leaves the temple with truckloads of blessings and gifts of a more real nature.

title: Calmness and Clean
review: We went there en route to Kausani from Nainital. It's on the banks of small rivulet. The Temple complex is very clean and there is no one heckling you for any alms or donations. The surroundings of the Temple gives a soothing and serene environment to the over all structure.

title: Awesome.... Must Must visit
review: Ut us one of the few temples which has high respect and value in the eyes of foreigners. Many foreigners perform seva in this temple. CEO of Apple and Facebook have their association with this majestic temple. It is not only must watch but it should be your priority to visit this temple if you are in this region. The Saint, for whom this temple is made, has fried the puris during starvation with water!!!.... And he served all the people that time and the Atta was as it is!!!!

title: Visit and see the magic of Baba ji
review: I visited first time here on 7th May 2017 and suggest you to visit this place at least once if your life time. Baba ji will solve all your problem.

title: Tranquil place to realize the innerself
review: This is my on route break for about an hour whenever i visit my native place (Almora) once a year. I get a divine feeling and vibes of Maharaj ji as soon as i enter the premises. It feels to be the calmest moment in life away from all miseries of life.

title: Ok
review: To visit if you are a religious follower or curious. Can be skipped otherwise. We went because it was in the tourist itinerary.

title: Neem Karoli Baba Ashram
review: Kainchi Dham is Neem Karoli Baba Ashram. It is around 10 to 12 kms. from nainital towards Ranikhet. Steve Jobs (Apple) and Mark Jukerberg (Facebook) had visited this place before they have started their venture.

title: INSPIRING!
review: The importance of the place is more of the feeling of the vibrations of the Guru... very well kept premise.

title: A place with spiritual value
review: This place is quite famous and has lot of worshippers. Place is god , serene.

title: Only worth it for devotees
review: This is a place for devotees of Babaji Neem Karoli, otherwise it may not be worth a visit. For those looking for scenic places, Nainital district is full of many. Just search on trip advisor.

title: Beside a river
review: It is a moderately big temple complex, actually it is a dham where religious practioners can stay. The temple is clean, but there are monkeys around and generally people stop here on their way to Nainital or on their return.

title: steve jobs connection
review: steve jobs stayed here and his life was changed and guided by the book he read here. very near to bhowali on way to almora

title: OK temple to see.
review: This is a place for devotees of Babaji Neem Karoli. one will enjoy only if you know about the Baba. Its pretty clean on the highway.

title: Nice place with a great view
review: Must drink the cold naibupani at the main gate of entrance to the temple. We (me and my family)  take a taxi  from nainital to kainchi dham that take 800-1000 and me and mummy got headache because of high altitude folds (very tricky turns) of mountain . But a great temple with a history that connects steave jobs and many highend profiles.  Must visit.

title: Peaceful and serene
review: One of the rare temples which fill you with positivity and peace. Having a very interesting and motivating story of Baba Neem Karoli and the experiences of many famous and successful people today, this unique blessed place is unlike other commercial holy places you might have visited in cities. Located between mountains and a stream, the aura here is enhanced through mother nature. One small thought though was the starting of litter dumping in the stream which was a little disappointing, as this serene place deserves more from us.

title: Serene, spiritual and full of blessings!
review: My trip to visit Baba Neem Karoli Ashram at Kainchi Dham was nothing short of blissful! I stayed at the Guru Kripa Guest house right next door as the ashram stay is closed for winter months. I was given a room with a balcony facing the temple with the saryu river tributary flowing right by its side. I met up with the noble manager, Joshi ji, who very fondly invited me to have dinner at the ashram itself after the evening arati. I was overwhelmed with his invitation, as this was pretty much the legacy being continued since Babaji's time where the visitors were blessed and then fed before they left the ashram. I left the next morning after meditation, prayers and and paying my obeisance at the feet of babaji.

title: 15th of June
review: The biggest day in the Kaichi Dham's History!! It's a fest celebrated every year on this day!!

title: Again I Feel Happiness of Life
review: In this trip, I feel again happiness of life. I spend 3 to 4 hours in the temple and I also visit baba dairy farm in near temple. My this Trip So Great and awesome. I hope Baba Ji Always with me.

title: For me Just a halt while going to Almora
review: For local people, may be an important temple, but for me it is a short break halt location to refresh from long driving. Opposite temple, one eat-out offers very good Fresh Lemon drinks, great refreshment to restart the journey.

title: Baba Neem Karoli ji
review: This is the same place of the Guru who was followed by Steve jobs, Julia Roberts and was told to seek by Steve jobs to Mark Zukerberg. A quaint little temple but the positive vibrations are aplenty in this place. One feels within a very pure environment when within the premises. The statue of Maharajji is life like and does seem to talk to you , if you sit quietly and watch him.

title: Great surroundings but too loud
review: The place is neat and clean but the devotional music being played there is just too loud. The visitors are not allowed to wear footwear inside the campus. I don't know how it will during the months of November and December when the weather is extremely cold. To stay at the ashram, you need to intimate them in advance. You get a letter to your home and present it at the time of check-in.

title: A less known but nice place to stop by
review: While we were heading towards Ranikhet from Nainital, we came across Kainchi Dham. Although, I did not know about this place earlier, we stopped there for a while because the temple and the din from there attracted us towards itself. Having visited the place we realized that the temple was worth it. You can enjoy tea from the nearby hawkers, it will help you refresh and re-energize for your journey ahead :) !!

title: Shikanji stopover
review: This place is located at an hour's drive from Nainital on the Almora Road.  For the religious folks, there is a temple, one flight of stairs down from the road, constructed beside a river.  For the weary traveller, there is superb Shikanji to be had at one of the stalls at the entrance of the temple.  The Kumaoni lemons are the biggest and the juiciest that one can find anywhere.  A good enough place to stop for half an hour en route.

title: Be here to experience calm and serenity
review: We reached here early in the morning. It was quite cold. However, the place had an amazingly calm and serene feeling.

title: Very soothing place
review: The positive atmosphere will relax your body and mind. There are very few places as such. You cannot stop here in the ashram without any special permission. When you roam outside, there aren't any places to stay. Here is one guest house, but there is no arrangement of food. We have either go to Bhawali, which is 45 minutes drive away from Kainchi dham. Main point is that there is no place to stay in the nearby area. Rest, this place is impeccable and positive vibes in the atmosphere is uncomparable.

title: natural beauty and inner-peace
review: The place is very quite, unaware of its beauty. It gives a rich experience of natural beauty and inner-peace

title: Clean. Inside and out
review: This temple has a calming effect on you. It soothes your nerves. When we visited, it was freezing cold but not once did we feel out of place. The place has been kept clean to the T.

title: Spiritual inspiration for Steve Jobs
review: Neem Karoli Baba was a great saint, considered as an avatar by his followers. He lived here.  It is certainly worth a visit here; even if you are not spiritually oriented. For those who feel the power of vibes; this could be  a tremendous experience. The best way to experience this place is to stop by while going to  or returning from Almora/Binsar/Pithoragargh  to /from Nainital or make it a day trip from Nainital.

title: Nice
review: Nice temple of the incomparable God incarnate Maharaj ji. The temple staff is very rude and inconsiderate.

title: Spiritual Place
review: The Temple is located in a valley. The route to the temple is very scenic and so the view from the temple. This temple is visited by Mark Zuckerberg and Steve Jobs

title: Temple tourism in UK
review: About half an hour away from nainital thus temple is one of the more popular temples of UK and holds a lot of significance amongst the local population.. The temple is also located right on the banks of a river and should be visited if the place comes in your route

title: Calm place to find yourself
review: Kainchi Dham was founded by baba Neeb Karori and is  located 45 mins from Nainital. The temple is non-descript and is  located close to the highway. The facility opens at around 7.00 AM (November to Mar) and at 6:00 AM (Apr to Oct) and closes at around 5:00 PM.

title: Beauty
review: The view from the place is simply amazing and the place is simply beautiful as I spent almost 2-3 hours but my heart was saying to stay there for some more time loved the place

title: Kainchi dham between two mountains
review: This is best temple between, seizer shapes mountains hence its call kainchi, its spiritual place to visit beauty of the temple and nice place for the tourists.

title: A Visit That will Touch Your Soul
review: The beautiful surrounding of the temple, the mountains around , the river flowing beside the temple the quiet clean temple in the mid of Himalayas will touch your soul

title: Its good temple for worship
review: Its made by some guru in hills near river amazing scenic view tourist came frequently there for worship.

title: Nice & Clean
review: We visited Kainchi Dham on our way back to Nainital from Binsar. It is a nice a clean temple. The main temple is fantastic and is built in super white marble. I heard Steve Jobs and Mark Zukerberg have also visited this place few years back. You can search this on internet. Good place to visit in kumaon

title: Baba ji is very ideal person to me
review: Became very happy to enter in the tample  we like it we want to go many time in the tample came me Baba ji bless me

title: Jai Karoli Baba
review: What a serene place. Karoli baba ashram is a famous destination for indians and foreigners. Steve jobs visited this ashram and got moksh is life. A must visit.

title: Temple of Peace
review: A must visit and easily spotable Temple on way to Almora from Nainital and just 9 kms from Bhowali..

title: peace of mind....
review: nim karolimal baba temple. was having very positive atmosphere. one must visit this spiritual place during nainital visit

title: Serene Temple, but recommended only if its on the way..!!
review: - This is very well maintained temple on the way to Ranikhet from Naintal. Use of mobile phones or camera is prohibited inside temple.

title: Peaceful and serene
review: It is a temple and home to Late Neeb Karori Baba who also once inspired Steve jobs and Mark zuckerberg. Very neat and clean place along the water channel with soothing bhajans getting sung all the time.

title: Godly Experience
review: A very well maintained Hindu shrine built by Maharaj Neeb Karori ji Maharaj in 1976. A very serene place to visit especially the Morning ang Evening AArtis. A must visiy place for Hindu devotees.

title: The Dham that was visited by Mark (Zuckerberg) and Steve (Jobs)
review: The Dham is located in a beautiful valley.  The small river that flows by the temple is amazing.  The restaurant next to the temple provides very good food at very cheap rates.  There is also a small hotel next to this restaurant.  And a very good public toilet, well maintained.

title: Old temple
review: Its a famous temple enroute to other serene places in kumaon from nainital, has been recognised locally and in the entire state.

title: Jai Shri Ram. A must visit place.
review: Abode of Neem Karori wale baba. A serene place and a must visit if one is around Nainital or visiting Almora, Ranikhet, Pithoragarh. I feel blessed to have visited the holy place on Dusshehra, i.e. 11/10/16 which was the last day of its opening. Although, we had plans to be at the place for short time and had to go ahead but "Artis" were being performed and it was festival like atmosphere there and we spent couple of hours which was truly soul touching. It will be closed for winters and would reopen on 15th April next year. So, Please check with locals if you are planning to visit now.

title: The abode of Neem Karori Baba
review: This place is a wonderful visiting spot for worship and also to see the abode of Neem Karori Baba. The cleanliness of the place is amazing.

title: Temple along a river
review: The temple is very clean and that is the best part about it. The route to temple is also very nice with great natural views. There is a small shop just outside the temple and the lime water over there was very tasty. Try it!

title: Holy place
review: It is on route to almora from nainital. At Kainchi Dham there is the famous Kainchi temple, which has the ashram of Neem karoli baba. This is the same place which was in news due to Steve jobs and Mark Zukerberg's visit. It is said that a visit to this temple can cut through your problems thus the name Kainchi. After the darshan dont miss the moong dal pakodas just outside the temple

title: god place
review: this temple is very special for the people who used to come from east coz they loves the whethers of this place.

title: Nice place to stop over and spend peaceful time
review: I went through this route few times before and never noticed it until I read about Mark Zuckerberg's article.

title: A devine Place to visit
review: Jai ho Neem Karoli Baba, this is one of the most beautiful places in Nainital region. very clean and quiet. a must visit

title: for peace, this is the place.
review: Must avoid Muradabad-(Rampur to Rudrapur)-Nainital road stretch as it is filled with ponds of water. Take Muradabad-Kashipur-Kaladungi -Nainitaal. It is bit longer but good driveway.

title: Holy place
review: This temple was the Tapoobhoomi of Divine Saint Neem Karoli Baba. You will find inner peice of mind when you visit this place.

title: Nice Temple  To visit
review: Kaichi dham is place which actually gives you an amazing experience , its known as holy place " Neem Karori  Babaji" ka ashram . Very neat and clean place, maintained very well . You may purchase books from the library . Best way is to drive down from Kathgodam(Last railway station in Kumau Region ) .

title: Maharajji' blessing must if you are a devotee.
review: This place is around 35Km from Nainital. You can hire a taxi or can take a bike on rent from Nainital in 700-800 bucks for full day and visit this place. This place is in the mountains with a beautiful scenic view. Maharajji was a very auspicious person and his blessings are still available in the temple around his tucket which is available there. Visit and take blessings.

title: Beautiful Temple
review: Very clean and quite temple with a flowing river and a has a rock which looks llike a frog sitting in the water.

title: Peace & Tranquility
review: A very beautiful & clean temple not very far from Nainital.One experiences complete peace & tranquility here.A must visit place.

title: Another establishment by Kiroli Baba
review: Indeed a very strong belief of Hindus in this temple. 15 June will be observed as grand fair. Temple is clean.

title: The Cleanest Temple Ever Visited
review: I visited Kainchi Dham on 15 June 2016, just one day after a gathering of 3 million people. In spite of being visited by such huge crowd, the temple was spotlessly clean. The river flowing by the temple didn't have slightest of sign of witnessing such huge human crowd. The clean river, clean floors, clean premises are the most amazing things of the temple.

title: Peaceful, calm, neat and clean temple
review: This Hanuman temple was set up by Baba Neem Karori and is one of the very well recognised temple. Neat and clean, with no commercial angle to it. One loves to visit and sit there in cool and calm environment.

title: A nice clean temple but not worth going 20 km away from Nainital
review: It is a  nice clean temple but not worth going 20 km away from Nainital. We went to office to know more about the found Kiroli Baba but they did not have any material/info about them and instead suggested us to use internet. I wonder why don't they provide virtual tour so that people do not waste money on this excursion.

title: Peaceful and Beautiful Temple
review: On the way from Ranikhet to Nainital, this is a popular temple for those who have faith! Well built, and big.

title: Pristine beauty in the midst of nature...
review: On the way to Almora from Haldwani, this place is definitely a must stop buy to pay tribute baba nimb karori who has set up this beautiful temple, extremely clean place with loads of visitors. There are people who are part of this place who lives there too...

title: Popular, beautiful and well-maintained
review: Very popular temple among the religious and tourists. Clean and well-maintained, located at a picturesque spot.

title: Very clean, calm 9 must visit
review: Visited Kainchi Dham with family and friends on 29-June. Kainchi Dham has Mandirs of  Hanumanji, Godess Durga, Lord Shiva, Lord Vishnuji, Durbar of Lord Ram and Maharajji Neem Karoli Baba. Their office has recently got LED back lit magnificent pictures of  Baba Neem Karoli .

title: Our second visit
review: This was our second visit to the temple after almost 10 years...  As the last time it was a great experience. Very neat and clean and well kept...

title: "...Must Visit..."
review: It a very famous temple of Shri Neeb Karori Baba which is on the way to Ranikhet from Nainital.  From Naintal it is about 18-20 kms.

title: A Blessing
review: The shrine and temple made by Ned Karauli Baba, situated on the bank of a lovely stream this is a place to visit. Lovely temples and flower gardens.

title: Good one
review: Place is very peaceful & quit. Feel the nature at its best. Parking is big issue. Can be relaxed while going further. Temple is very neat & clean

title: calm and serene place
review: i am feeling truly blessed after being to Neemkirori baba's place. the settings are quite serene with hanuman chalisa being rendered continuously. must visit place for all stressed people.

title: Serene
review: This may not be there in everyone's list buts a great place. Great location, very calm, peaceful, serene. Its on the way to Kausani, Ranikhet, 13 kms from Nainital.

title: Great place
review: Kainchi dham of Neeb karori maharaj ashram is about 17km from Bhimtal and located nicely between the green hills. The   place is very peaceful and soothing.

title: Neemkaroli Baba
review: Kainchi dham is very much famous for neemkaroli baba. some people says baba is a avtar of hanuman ji. the temple is very much  famous for steve jobs and mark zuckerberg visit.

title: Small temple on the way
review: if you have time then you can visit this temple. Nothing much to see here. It was on the way of our journey. Temple is very clean and peaceful though.

title: Serene place near Bhowali Nainital
review: I visited this place very first time few years back while coming back from Ranikhet to Nainital. I did not know anything about it .Only name Kainchi Dham so thought that is was temple of scissors. But no it was temple dedicated to Neem Karoli Baba when he was staying here.

title: Kainchi Dham
review: on the Nainital _almora road ,17 km from Nainital is modern pilgrim centre.This place has achieved recognition owing to the ashram of the famous Neem Karoli Maharaj.

title: Abode of Peace
review: I have know the legend of Neem Kirori Baba much before Steve Jobs and Mark Zukerberg made it famous...

title: Religion with Nature
review: I Started my journey from Lucknow on the night of  26th June 2016 by Inova via baraily but road condition for 100 Km was pathetic .we stopped vehicle at 3 AM on 27th and resumed journey in the morning at  6 AM . Due to tourist season , there was rush and jam anyhow we reached Kainchi Dham via bhowali which is 9 KM from there. Only one is there that is Gurukripa . We were 3 persons so we booked one room tariff was 1200 Rs. The place is very nice . a hill river flows alongwith the road and the temple of Neeb kirauri Baba is  situated at the bank of the river , a small pedestrian bridge has been made to reach the temple. place is small , very few bulidings are there but it is surrounded by  hills. after the sunset , one can feel the complete silnce . only problem is the commercial vehicles in the night . I have not visited a place like that where one can experience spriualiy and nature both , must viisit place .

title: Beautiful Temple of Maharaj Ji
review: Kaichi Temple is near by Nainital.

title: Serenity of this place is just awesome
review: Even Steve Jobs visited this place during his visit to India in 1973. its being said Julia Roberts also got attracted towards Hinduism after visiting this place. Surely this place has something in it . On the bank of a small hilly river the Kainchi Dham will definitely give you peace of mind. its just around 10 km from Nainital. and a worth visit.

title: NICE TEMPLE VERY GOOD ARRANGEMENT
review: The temple is on way from Nainital to Ranikhet. But it is nearer to Nainital. The temple is very popular amongst the locals. This was the place where Neem Karoli Baba spent his last years of his life. The arrangement at the temple is very good. The temple is very neat and clean and you will find lot of shops and eateries around the temples (not in the campus). A good place to visit.

title: beautiful location
review: this temple is dedicated to neem karori baba who meditated there and people believes that they still exist there.

title: Truly Spiritual
review: There is a spiritual surge in this ashram. I have been visiting this place even before the celebrity hype. Great experience.

title: Peaceful Ashram
review: Temples are very attractive and peace loving people can sit and meditate for long time undisturbed in its prectincts.

title: Kainchi Dham !
review: The temple is around 10 -15 km from Bhowali and is in enroute when you visit almora/ranikhet.  Very peaceful place.. you need to cross a small bridge to reach the temple.  photography not allowed inside.

title: Divine Place
review: I with family always visit Kainchi Dham whenever I passes that Road. This is the most divine and blessed place I have ever been to.

title: Baba Neem Karoli dham
review: One of the most sacred place near Bhowali.. The Ashram is on a river stream and very  old..Baba Neem Karoli is considered as the hanuman ji  avtar..Must visit place.

title: Famous Baba Neem Karoli temple.
review: Located on the river Stream on Nainital - Almora Road. Famous among locals very sacred temple of Baba Neem Karoli . Main temple is dedicated to Lord Hanuman ji . Very beautiful location for meditation .

title: At The Master's Feet
review: Neebhkarori Baba or Neemkaroli Baba as He is known in India and abroad was one of India's celebrated Spiritual Gurus.

title: A peaceful temple
review: Its on way from Nainital to Munsiyari, It is an ashram of Neem Karolo Baba  its a religious & picnic place. A must visit when visiting Nainital

title: What an atmosphere
review: I have been to kainchi dham twice and both the time in the month of June, when there was a mela in the dham. Thousands of people coming to celebrate and to get a glimpse of their god, will make the atmosphere sacred. I like the prasad served there specially the "maal poua." Situated 9 kms from Bhowali, it is on the route to Almora and a small stream makes this place beautiful.

title: Amazing experience
review: Amazing Temple highlight of my trip to the Himalayas would highly recommend a visit

title: This temple is muat visit, if you are in Nainitaal
review: History: The first temple of Lord Hanuman was inaugurated in June 15, 1964. In 1962, Maharajji (Baba Neem Karoli) built a chabootara (platform) around a place where two spiritual gurus Sadhu Premi Baba and Sombari Maharaj had performed Yagyas in Kainchi village. The Hanuman temple was later built over the platform thus establishing the Kainchi Ashram. Baba Neem Karoli died on September 10, 1973. A temple for him was subsequently built at the Ashram. His statue was consecrated on June 15, 1976. This statue looks almost real one.

title: Peaceful temple such  is  Fill  Like   Haven
review: Am  with  friends  n family  couple days  spent over there  such is very  beautifully temple  and    this place has definite spiritual attraction...... m . i visit  ones  time  more

title: Beauatiful place of worship
review: it Feels so holy in the mandir campus. must visit this again if i went there. lovely garden arround the temple

title: "Awesome MoongDaal ka Pakodi"
review: Its a small temple which attracts the people to this place. Visited the place on my way to Kausani from Kathgodam. The shop just adjacent to the entrance of the Dham sells awesome Moong Daal ka pakodi.. Try it.. !!

title: God's Own Place
review: I am a frequent visitor to this place. The serenity and tranquility of this place has definite spritual attraction also endorsed by the founders of world's largest business houses such as Apple & Facebook.

title: Good location
review: excellent location and very neat and clean. Would recommend for visits. Beware of monkeys. Very well maintained

title: Blessings of Kaichi Baba on New Year Day 01/01/2016
review: i was a small child when i first visited Kaichi Dham , Baba Neeb Karoli was alive at that time , i was lucky enough to have his blessings , once you are there you feel that you are in the lap of God Hanuman , feeling i got as a child and even after 4 decades when i visited on 1st Jan this year. believe me it is so rejuvenating , i got fresh energy and feel younger , after visit of shrine enjoyed hot pakoras of Moong Dal , aaloo , Gobi etc along with a hot cup of tea. A fantastic experience i had with my family and for me how to explain visit after more than four decades.

title: A Peaceful Temple Baba Neem Karoli Kainchi Dham
review: Baba Neem Karoli temple is very Peaceful and clean. Under bridge Small river view is to Beautiful.Me and my friends will visit again in 2016.

title: A locally revered Dham on way to Almora
review: It is a famous pilgrimage site and can be accessed by walking from the Bhowali-Almora road. The pakora and chai at the dhaba are local favourites. The temple has a festival every year and attracts lots of worshippers.

title: Kainchi Dham
review: Amazing temple, ashram and its location. Awesome idols of all the gods, godesses and the baba. Good food and facilities available around the temple. A must visit when visiting Nainital region..

title: Visit to Kainchi
review: Inspite of travelling to Nainital  a no of times, this was the first time we made a visit to Kainchi Dham, Was very much ispired  the way it is maintained. Any one visiting Nainital should visit this Dham.

title: Kainchi Dhaam
review: Kainchi Dhaam is a beautiful place , located on Ranikhet road , Beautiful stream , temples , its a religious & picnic place , Facebook owner visited this place this year

title: Divine Place
review: Its on way from Nainital to Munsiyari,

title: Dedicated to Spritiualism
review: It was a chance journey to the place and was surprised to note that the place has had Steve Jobs and Mark FACEBOOK Zukerburg visiting the place dedicated to Neem Kakori Baba an Hanumanji Devotee.

title: Experience Spiritualism and Peace of Mind
review: An amazing location in the lap of Himalayas where you can experience spiritualism and peace of mind and can also explore surrounding natural beauty.

title: Baba Neem Karauli's SIDDH & Holy Shrine
review: Between mica hills this shrine is situated, where regular offering to Lord Hanuman are being offered. If we prey for our any desire, Baba fulfills it at the earliest. We can never mis the prasad of Graams, sweet and rich in ashirvad of BABA. Baba resides here, anyone can feel.

title: Very clean & religiously empowering
review: One of the very rare holy & religious place which is not only very clean & well maintained but also not at all commercially exploiting. The values are being very well maintained & I have become a fan of this place.

title: Visited by chance...or u can say God's call.
review: Very calm, Neat, peaceful temple. Will visit again with family. We came to know about Shree Neeb karoori Baba and importance of this temple after coming back to Delhi.

title: Spiritual Experience
review: If you are visiting Nainital then you must visit Kainchi Dham..Neat &  Clean Temple...Just 17 Km from Nainital Must Visit Place

title: Worth visit
review: I decided to visit this temple on the way to mukteswar.remember is really clean peaceful and clean.photograph not allowed within temple but can be taken outside.temple is on bank of small river which is very clean.Must visit.

title: Must visit unique experience
review: After hearing all the hype in media abt Steven Jobs and Zuckerberg's visit, there was some kind of excitement in my family but all the more we also wanted to get the blessings for better life. First of all, our drive from Nainital to Kainchi Dham was so fullsome with lot of fog on the ways that we thoroughly enjoyed trhe journey. On reaching there, we were spell bound the scenic beauty around and the cleanliness of the ashram. baba's simple living was unique. The bhajans were so good that we sat for a few minutes in temple- immersing ourselves in bhajans.

title: Religious Visit
review: One of the Best temple in Nainital. It is very very clean, serene and calm. Photography strictly not allowed.

title: A good temple to visit - Made famous by Mark Zuckerberg (Founder, Facebook)
review: We had never heard of this temple earlier, but apparently during a recent visit to India, Mark Zuckerberg mentioned taking 'Aashirwaad' (blessings) from Neeb karori Baba 's temple at kainchi Dham long back and attributed his and Facebook's success to this. This created excitement towards this place in my family.

title: A Long wish to visit to this place
review: A Long wish to visit to this place get fulfilled this month.

title: Ram Ram
review: Neem Karoli Baba. Hanuman. Kirtan. Oh my God what an experience.

title: Across the rivulet, beautifully made temple
review: This temple is just next to the nainital road across a rivulet flowing parallel. There are suitable resting arrangements and good restaurants around. Especially the tea at the dhaba just in front of the main gate is too good.

title: Maybe the neatest and most beautiful temple, with temples of Gods, Goddesses and lifesize statue of Neeb Karori Maharaj.
review: First of all about the name Kainchi Dham. It means sharp bends, called kainchi in local dialect hence Kainchi Dham.

title: visit to naini and surrounding places
review: a must visit place. This temple is located near bhowali along the river and will ease u of all your worries once you visit this temple and meditate there for half an hour. the chanting of hyms and kirtan will sooth your mind. must visit for peace of mind and spend at least two hours in the temple. Not to forget the chane ka prasad and puri .

title: Make sure that you spend some quality time at this temple!
review: Its a beautiful and a clean temple. Not too crowded though a must visit spot for people flocking to the hill-station.

title: must see place
review: the location of kainchi dham is marvelous,and 100%. marks for the cleanliness and maintaince of the place-the attractions power of this temple idols is superb.

title: Extreme Serenity
review: If you are visiting Kumaon region, it must be in your wish list. Located on the way to Almora from Kathgodam, you must stop here to visit this very nice temple. Don't forget to eat "Magori" a local deep fried delicacy, made up of green gram and yes hot tea.

title: Must visit place near bhowali!
review: Good Place to visit around Bhowali! Must visit as this place is very well maintained and you can feel the inner peace. The Surrounding is also very serene.

title: Auspicious Kaichi Dham
review: Very good temple on the route from Kausani to Nainital. Very clean and auspicious place. Very good Prasadam and experience. Very inspiring story of Babaji who founded the temple.

title: peaceful
review: must visit if you love peace , its so neat and clean have not visited a temple so neat and clean its a place where you can just sit relax for hours a must for a traveler who like visiting temples

title: KAINCHIDHAM    9 KM FROM BHOWALI  UTRAKAND  INDIA  17 KM FROM NAINITAL
review: The wonderful location and beautiful temple make you to stop ,if you are on the way to Almora from Nainital [17 kms from Nainital].. Famous because of ashram of Shri Neem Karoli Baba Maharajji.

title: Sacred
review: We have been here twice.  Once while going to Kausani, our driver stopped here for a break (breakfast too).  The same thing happened while we were returning from Almora.  To me, The Kainchi Dham is all about Good ambience, sacred feelings accompanied by the nature.

title: A Peaceful Modern Pligrimage
review: We have been here 3-4 times. This place is very beautiful & well maintained . The scenic location adds to the beauty of the place. Any person can feel the divinity of the place, the positive vibrations and energy at the place is captivating. You will feel divine peaceful atmosphere deep within . This place has an aura which makes you believe in the Divine presence and Power.

title: A nice clean temple
review: This is a beautiful picturesque temple. It is kept spotlessly clean, probably the best anywhere in this area.

title: CLEAN AND WELL RUN
review: Deities and Idol of Baba nIbkarori on the road side about 10 km off Bhowali towards Almora  attract you to this modern templ;e of Kenchi devi. Most pleaple take a break off their tiring journey to and from hIlly terrain of Almoda or Pithoragarh , here,  to relax, visit tmeples and take a bite with tea in the road side eateries/restaurants..

title: A OK Place
review: Not sure why there is so much hype. May be before u enter Nainital through Alomora or Ranikhet, it will be the first place the cab fellow would ask you to visit. I find there are other good places to go unless you are a devotee of the holy man

title: the valley temple
review: We visited on our way from Ranikhet to Nainital. It is beautiful and peaceful place.

title: Must Visit
review: It's a nice temple surrounded by hills and trees and river flowing besides it. Very well maintained temple which is extremely clean and where you can feel at peace. We witnessed the evening aarti. Must visit.

title: Nice place situated on the way to Ranikhet.
review: We had a halt over there while we were on the way to Ranikhet.

title: Nice temple on way to Ranikhet
review: This is a nice,clean temple .a must watch while going to Ranikhet . It is 10-12 km from nanital. The aura is good .

title: peaceful place
review: It is a lovely ashram in foot-hills, very tidy and made of shining white marbel. The ambience is very peaceful and blessed. A nice place to visit for spiritually inclined people.

title: On way to Kuasani
review: Great Temple near a river and connected through a bridge, flowers in the temple premises is very beautiful and multiple temples are inside. Do not forget to drink nimbu pani of himalayan nimbu outside the temple

title: Peaceful temple, yummy food
review: We crossed Kainchi Dham en route from Nainital to Ranikhet. The temple complex is peaceful and a must visit. A rivulet runs between the road and the temple which can be easily accessed by a bridge. On the road side there are numerous eateries, we found Maruti Restaurant to be the best. Their pakoras, bread pakora and mungoris are mouthwatering.

title: Serene n calm
review: Impeccably clean and an amazingly calm atmosphere in the lap of nature. If you want to relish in the thoughts of the almighty, this is the place for you

title: very peaceful
review: Very peaceful and calm place.My parents believe in neem karoli babaji a lot so paid a visit there. its not a must visit but if you believe in him you must go.

title: Very peaceful and calm
review: Must visit if possible. It is an ashram of Neem Karoli Baba, popularly known as Maharajji.  Go with an open mind, there's a good chance that you will like the calm of this place. This place is extremely popular. We went in an off season. There was hardly anybody there. We loved it.

title: BEAUTIFUL
review: Very beautiful religious place. Neat and clean, properly maintained. Do visit whenever u visit Nainital.

title: temple in nainital
review: It is a placed at an altitude of (1400 MT) On the Nainital - Almora Road, 9 Km from Bhowali and 17 Kms from Nainital is a modern pilgrim centre. This place has achieved recognition owing to the ashram of the famous Shri Neem Karoli Baba Maharajji.

title: Indian Spirituality at its best..
review: The cleanliness...and location of this temple..makes it a must visit...for anyone with 1% spiritual inclination...

title: Kainchi Dham is best maintained most clean temple in this area.
review: Kainchi Dham is best maintained most clean temple in this area.

title: sacred peaceful place
review: this temple deserve to be appreciated about its cleaninaess.prashad we get here is very yasty. it is alsp a beautiful temple.we also got darshan of the saint here,and got blessing.facilities around the mandir is also good

title: A rare one
review: This temple complex lies on the way to Ranikhet. It is believed to be established by Neem Karoli Baba whose idols and photographs and also his belongings are there. Except from these small temples of other God and Goddess are there.Do drop here on your way and spend 10-15 minutes.

title: sacred place
review: It is a b'ful temple with idols  of different Gods and Nim Karori Baba ji.Close to Bhavali and about 45 min drive from Nainital ,on way to Almora this is a most popular stop over for tourists.View is very good all around. A brief stop over  is a must here.

title: Serenity
review: It's a lovely temple above a flowing river! Very well maintained and a must visit. A little story that most Cabbies enroute will tell yo uis that This place, along with two others ahead all have scary names. Kainchi(scissor)dham, followed by garampani (hot water) followed by khairna (won't be spared) ! All said..  a lovely calm temple which on a usual day is extremely peaceful, not many visitors and has a gorgeous view of the surroundings.

title: its ok..
review: nothing fancy about it..its a quite and clean place..i certainly like d the "moong ki daal ke pakode" at a shop just above this dham..

title: Very Clean and good location
review: Kainchi dham is located at a very good place and the temple is very good & clean. Its worth a visit. It is just a few kms from Bhowali and is a major attraction for Nainital-Bhimtal visitors.

title: Peaceful and Heavenly atmosphere
review: Very live gods and godesses and pleasent heavenly bhajans being played are good to mind and soul. Just stay there for a while and listen to the bhajans will remove all the stress. Beautiful river passing by and the sweet sound makes us feeling better as we stay there...

title: Glimpse of the Divine
review: While traveling in the vicinity a stop at the ashram for "darshan" & "prasad" is a saving grace.
